volunteer_experience.info:
Help Us to Help the Child is a non-profit organization working passionately to provide education to the unprivileged section of society.I joined this organization in 2017 and was the Literacy Centre Head for a year. In this role, I was responsible for preparing teaching schedules as per the students time, exams and also responsible for organizing functions for children like Independence Day celebrations, Republic Day celebrations etc. I was a bridge between the students and their parents…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Help Us to Help the Child is a non-profit organization working passionately to provide education to the unprivileged section of society.I joined this organization in 2017 and was the Literacy Centre Head for a year. In this role, I was responsible for preparing teaching schedules as per the students time, exams and also responsible for organizing functions for children like Independence Day celebrations, Republic Day celebrations etc. I was a bridge between the students and their parents and the other volunteers of HUHC. I became HUHC Pune Chapter Head in 2018 and had to manage and overlook all volunteers, and make sure that all the department heads were committed to their work. I acted as a bridge between our founder Mr Shwet Srivastava and the Pune chapter volunteers.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
